name: Einthusan Monitor
tagline: Einthusan Monitor is a chrome extension to monitor www.einthusan.com for new HD movies.
body:
![Extension Icon](https://raw.github.com/zambrey/Einthusan-Monitor/master/icon652.png)

### Installation
* To add this extension to your chrome browser, visit [this](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/einthusan-monitor/khhfpiaglmihaifnfocggdmifdeigkhg) page on Chrome Web Store.

### Features
* Lists the latest HD movies on www.einthusan.com.
* Notifies as soon as new HD movies become available.
* Allows to play movies straight from the extension.
* Provides a way to search in all available HD movies.
* Presents user with customization options for presentation as well as back end.

### Version Updates
_v2.6_
* Bug Fixes

_v2.5_
* Added support link in options
* Bug Fixes

_v2.4_
* Manual refresh button in options.
* Bug fixes.

_v2.3_
* Bug fixes.

_v2.2_
* Options can be opened from tools in popup window.
* Bug fixes.

_v2.1_
* Bug fixes.

_v2.0_
* Search option for all HD movies introduced.

_v1.2_
* Modiefied user interface.
* Option to switch between list and tile view.
* Customizable default language and refresh interval.
* Introduced information panel.
* Bug fixes.

_v1.0_
* Lists latest HD movies available on www.einthusan.com.
* Notifies as soon as new movie becomes available.
